name: Lava Run (SubJay)
description:
DISCLAIMER: This is my first time uploading to itch.io, if something doesn't work because I did not upload properly, please let me know and be patient with me. Thank you!

HELLO!

This is not only my first submission on itch.io, but it's my very first game ever made. I originally was just testing features of Godot out but when it was all said and done I ended up having a neat little project. I'm sorry for the art of it, I am no artist. The art that looks decent was actually downloaded off of itch.io, the music too!

THE GAME:

This game is a simple endless jumper, with it being randomly generated until you die. The game saves your high scores, and keeps track of an in game currency that you'll want to save up with  so you can afford one of the many skins! 

BUGS!

PLEASE LET ME KNOW IF YOU EXPERIENCE ANYTHING WONKY

Like I said, this is my first game and I want to be able to go back and fix any mess I may have created.

CREDITS:

ART:

All of the art I used, I either made or edited from other itch.io users. I will attempt to list everyone:

Pixel Frog (Sprites for skins)

Arks >>> Twitter:  @ScissorMarks (Sprites for skins)

Free Tiny Hero Sprites Pixel Art >>> craftpix.net (Sprites for skins)

Tiny Worlds (Font)

Jan Barboza|GGCoffee (Bread Sprite)

Pixel Pete

Henry Software

(If an artist recognizes their work and I failed to mention you up above, please let me know and I will get that fixed.)

MUSIC and SOUND:

Tim Beek 

Also shoutout to:

Terry Cavanagh (BOSCA CEOIL)

and

Cedric Stoquer (Bleeper)

CODING AND EVERYTHING ELSE:

Done by yours truly. :D

I hope you enjoy, thank you for trying it out!
